Entries.default: "When we're done here, we should go back to that little winery, the one we saved from xaurips near Dyrford."
"Do you remember when we first met? You told that man to, ah, pleasure his sister?"
"Did I remember to send those missives? Wonder if Harama and Tuaha ever made it to the Deadfire..."
"Do you recall when we first met, Watcher? Aboard the ship from [Player Culture]?"
"Be reminding me of the library at Dunnage. One I took you to? With the, ahem, more private piratical logs..."
"Watcher... You remember why we started traveling together? Just seems to've, uh, slipped my mind."
"Captain, was it you I invited to the Wild Mare? I told myself I would never forget that night..."
"That song pa taught me- used to sing it to my... sister? Gods, what was her name?"
"My friend you found in the wreckage- what happened to him? Where did he go?"
"Once this is behind us, remind me to shake down Bertenno for those damned gloves. Wait. Didn't you return them?"
"Did I ever buy you that drink at the Officers' Lounge? I had some stuff I wanted to get off my chest..."
"Have we... ever... no, I'm sorry, that's much too forward. It's just- we haven't kissed, have we?"
